video:video.video:title: Hill Crest Residency Electrical Meters Installed: Ready Possession While Others Wait Years
video:video.video:description: While most Bahria Town projects stay "under construction" indefinitely, Hill Crest Residency tenants are moving in next week. Electrical infrastructure complete, 50% booking secures your apartment today.
